title: Online Intensive Workshop on Evidence-Based Practice (EBP) in Nursing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Practice Experience and Foundational Understanding of Research Methodology
context.additional_context: Problem-solving learning environment based on practical scenarios. Strengthens competencies through peer collaboration and individualized feedback

learning_goals: Learners can solve practical problems by applying the 7-step Evidence-Based Practice (EBP) framework to virtual clinical scenarios.
Through group discussions, learners can explain core concepts at each stage of the EBP process.
Via individual assignments, learners can develop EBP project proposals using the PICO(T) framework.

resources: Literature search tool (e.g., PubMed) access permissions

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
